Title: Cycling Dive to the Heart Omega (Ultimate)
Description: See video. 7 stained glass models rotate around the stage.

Title: Custom Results Screen Vectorized Franchise Icon Examples
Description: First attempt at making franchise icon models. This method is a compromise between making optimized vectors and the simplicity of images. See http://forums.kc-mm.com/index.php?topic=82091 for the process of making these.

Title: Sierra (Pokemon GO)
Description:
For the Elisabeth moveset. I'd add a link to the moveset but I'm not sure where it came from. The Down+B counter move kinda looks like the shields in Pokemon GO too. The hand rigging is somewhat off since the model and skeleton didn't match up perfectly.

Model Source: https://www.deviantart.com/maxdemon6/art/Pokemon-GO-Leader-Sierra-842708984

Title: IMPROVED Mansion Basement
Description: I fixed missing palette references, fixed the door UVs, and removed some objects that blocked the camera.

Title: IMPROVED Magma Shaft
Description: This stage's ship model had some problems that would cause Dolphin Emulator to complain. I fixed those problems! This is a fun stage where debris flies at the ship. Some debris can interact with the characters before it flies off screen.

Title: AI recovery improvement: Princess Amaterasu
Credit: with credit to RedFlash and SOTCrulz
Description:
This is just the Fit*MotionEtc.pac file. You'll need the other files from http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=33578

Since this moveset was based off a character that originally didn't teleport, the AI would usually fail to recover. The AI is able to actually use the recovery move now!

More information: http://forums.kc-mm.com/index.php?topic=81003.0

Title: Zora Belmont
Description:
Zora Link tries out some new weapons.
For either Belmont moveset: http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=218338

Title: Officer Jenny (Pokémon Let's Go, Pikachu!  Eevee!)
Description: I made a custom parasol texture too

Title: Senbonzakura (with torii in background)
Description: The original version of this stage (http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=207122) allowed you to climb a torii. The height and shape of the torii could trap AI players on one side of the stage. I moved the stage back so the torii are in the background, deleted the torii collisions, and adjusted the Pokemon Trainer spawn points.

Title: Nurse Joy (Pokémon: Let's Go, Pikachu! / Eevee!)
Description: This model is rather large with all of Peach's weapons. Reducing texture quality may help if this import won't work with certain movesets.

Title: Corrin (Female)
Description:
I finally got around to rigging Corrin (Female). Enjoy!
I also updated the hand and hair rig of Corrrin (Male): http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=212298

I'm aware that part of her hair clips through her final smash transformation but I don't know how to fix that without editing the moveset (untested moveset editing solution: http://forums.kc-mm.com/index.php?topic=61930.msg1166202#msg1166202).

Some recolor textures can also be found in the model download: http://www.models-resource.com/3ds/supersmashbrosfornintendo3ds/model/15704/

Title: Hidan V3
Description:
I re-rigged this model to help identify a problem with Brawlbox's metal material generation. I think his cloak looks better now too.

Works over ike, no bone edits were made.

Hidan PSA: http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=36138

Includes a Riku PSA version: http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=28629

Title: Dark Souls Aizen
Action: Texture, Vertex, Import, Other (Effects, Animations, Final Smash, etc.)
Description:
So, I only had one bad guy in my vault and his preview was the only red thumbnail before this mod got done. So, yes... my thumbnail's color do have a purpose. So, without any more delay... here is Aizen. 

He has optional textures to make him have his sword trails from BLEACH Dark Souls and his Iconic Outfit has been given 10 color options based on Dark Souls colors.

This mod has:
10 Skins
10 CSPs
10 BPs
10 Renders

Title: Death (Reaper Form)
Description:
I made this import a long time ago so I thought I'd post it.

Thanks Omniscient X for the model!

Title: Lloyd 7.5 Fixed Materials, Shaders and Alpha Channels
Authors: Ebola16, BlackJax96, tempesttime, Hubert Oswell, ramonM64, Gigaeel, Leoct8
Credit: with credit to The original \"Lloyd-over-Wolf\" team as credited in the Readme and ShadowRockShoota for playtesting.
Action: Texture, Vertex, Import, Moveset (PSA), Other (Effects, Animations, Final Smash, etc.)
Description:
Update: "Bit Variables Beyond 255 and Negative Offset Variables [Magus]" compatibility version (minimal testing)

BlackJax96 was able to correct a few material and shader issues with Lloyd 7.5 that caused it to be incompatible with Brawlbox v0.78.

I applied these fixes to all the costumes and re-added alpha compositing when necessary.

Title: All-Star Mode Rest Area over Final Destination
Credit: with credit to DSX8 and R̢i҉̴̛͜d̷̕҉̴l̨̧͠͡e͘͜͠y̴̶͡͠͞
Description:
.rel-less ports are apparently still useful for non-Brawl-mode stages.
This version of the stage does not have the respawn issues of the original stage import. I fixed an issue with TEV indirect textures that caused the doorway to flicker on real Wiis. I also added item spawning and evenly-spaced stage position entries. A version with the character panels is also included in the download but I haven't done anything with them so they'll probably look bad over Final Destination.

Title: Smash 4 Styled Team Battles - vBrawl Edition
Description:
The vBrawl version is finally here!

NOTE: the instructions will say to copy the "projectm" folder to the root of the SD card - instead, you should copy the "private" folder to the root of the SD card.

Thanks to ebola16 for converting the ef_common.pac to work properly in vBrawl!

Title: IMPROVED Golbez
Description: I added an alpha function to this model to properly display transparent textures. The texture quality improvement is most notable on his helmet.

Title: KITTY
Description:
Here's a kitty from Batman: Arkham Asylum.
It replaces the Nintendog.
Instructions and kitty sounds are included.

Title: IMPROVED Cresselia
Description: The original import had shader issues that caused Cresselia's colors to appear washed out. I redid the shaders, materials, and gave Cresselia a pink egg.

Title: Neuron
Description:
I really like biology. Here's a myelinated neuron! More info on neurons: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Neuron

For Orbitar Pit PSAs
Blizzard Orbitar moveset: http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=205649

Flame Orbitar moveset: http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=202735

Model Source: http://animium.com/2011/09/neuron-cell-3d-model

Title: Saber Shield Direction Reversal
Description:
Saber's grounded Down-B attack would display other Link model shields backwards. I corrected this behavior by rotating SpecialLw's TateM visible shield frames (abs(X degrees) and (Y degrees)-180). It doesn't look too bad for the original Saber model either.
This download only contains the edited motion file. The rest of the PSA can be found here: http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=27924

Title: Jar Jar Binks
Description:
Here's a custom model of Jar Jar Binks from Star Wars! His eyes turn red upon entering the Final Smash state.

Model source: http://animium.com/2008/07/jar-jar-binks

Title: PSA Friendly Darth Vader
Authors: Ebola16, ShadowSnake, KingJigglypuff, nanobuds, GBC, gurdoman, Ashingda
Action: Texture, Vertex, Import, Moveset (PSA), Other (Effects, Animations, Final Smash, etc.)
Description:
The original import did not work with many PSAs. I reduced the filesize and optimized the model. It now works with the TriforceGanondorf v3.1 Mixed PSA (http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=206872). It may work with other PSAs too.
I also included an edited version of the TriforceGanondorf v3.1 Mixed PSA that uses Demise's sword as the secondary sword and has The Imprisoned as a final smash.

Title: The Grand Inquisitor
Description:
Here's The Grand Inquisitor from Star Wars Rebels! He comes with 3 versions: one blade, two blades, and second blade visible on Final Smash only.

Model Source: http://jakegreen163.deviantart.com/art/Star-Wars-Rebels-Inquisitor-530067729

Title: Captain Hook
Description:
Here's Captain Hook from Kingdom Hearts! Comes with two versions, one for Marth and one for the Flynn Scifo moveset (http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=35498)
He was a lot harder to import than I expected.

Title: Pokemon B/W - Relic Castle (Spawn Fix)
Description: The original stage contained a typo that made Players 2 and 4 spawn at the same location. I corrected the problem. DSX8's linked video shows the stage before the spawn correction was made. This stage has animated Pokemon and pillars.

Title: Barnacle Boy
Description:
Here's Barnacle Boy from SpongeBob SquarePants: The Yellow Avenger
Comes with two version, one for Lucario and one for the Kid Buu PSA (http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=23335)

Title: Obito Moveset
Credit: with credit to and thanks to Ebola16 for the original model
Action: Texture, Texture, Texture, Vertex, Import, Other (Effects, Animations, Final Smash, etc.)
Description: Youll need the texture, motion, And GCT file to make this work...Obito Is over ike and his moveset is not done but it is something to definitely play with..Works with game cube control Jump and hold  he can dissolve through objects but let go of  after you go through he will be able to fall through the level...Btw you can make others dissolve through the level too for the easy kill...NOTE HE STILL HAS IKE MOVES PSA IS NOT DONE ..P.S he can also teleport hold L and R with up on the D pad when only using gamecube controller to save coordinates then hold L and R and Up on the D pad to teleport there

Authors: Ebola16, GentlemanPotato, Flygon, DoctorFlux(Mariodk), SonicBrawler, Carnage, Hacksponge, ShadowLuigi~NG~, Kingskull95, Spex130, AkaDarkZeroRmx, StupidMarioFan1, zeldadove, Kyouma, Frusciante, Serpifeu, Aghanim, Virizia, JokerPTOH, tryptech

Full Imgur album: http://imgur.com/a/rWCyu

Update: Added SackBoy
For the Krillin over Pikachu Moveset (http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=30519)

Title: Riku Models with Transparent Textures
Description:
For the Riku Moveset Final Version PSA (http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=28629).
The original models included in this moveset did not have alpha properties set for transparent materials so texture artifacts would appear. With alpha properties, transparent materials display properly. This significantly improved the looks of many clothing, weapon, and face materials. This download only contains the edited models.

Title: Naruto Siege over Final Destination
Description:
Two .rel-less ports. I also extended the stage collisions slightly.
Now that the Alternate Stage Loader is compatible with Brawlex, there shouldn't be a need for me to make .rel-less ports anymore. Enjoy!

Title: IMPROVED Orphan's Cradle
Description: I moved the Pokemon Trainers so they won't be covered by the center platform.

Title: Ilex Forest Shrine over Final Destination
Description: .rel-less port. I also enabled item spawning on this beautiful stage.

Title: IMPROVED Metal Harbor
Credit: with credit to Oizen and Mewtwo2000
Description: I corrected the Pokemon Trainer locations so they aren't floating and frozen in midair.

Title: Mewtwo's Lab V3
Description: I updated the stage with Final Destination's stage position data. This fixes the Pokemon Trainer spawning locations and places Lucario's Final Smash position in a logical location.

Title: IMPROVED Gerudo Valley (Item Spawn Fix + PT adjustment)
Description: I added the ability to spawn items on this awesome stage. The bridge collapses, reforms, and has damaging spikes at the bottom. I also slightly adjusted the placement of the Pokemon Trainers.

Title: PSA Friendly Smash 3C Yuna
Description:
Specifically this is for the Gunner Yuna DO style Version 1.0 Beta moveset (http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=19676). It may help with other PSA file size issues too.

I changed the texture encoding to significantly reduce file size.

Title: Kakashi Moveset (More Alts)
Authors: Ebola16, LookItsLink, ShadowSnake, Naruto200Man, BlueBrain, Demon_of_Elru, Iwvi, carbuncle700, Kyouma, FinalEmperor, Xenozoa425, Resistance, Ryztiq, Edwguard Flows
Action: Texture, Vertex, Import, Moveset (PSA), Other (Effects, Animations, Final Smash, etc.)
Description:
Full Imgur album: http://imgur.com/gallery/TKrDk
Update 3: Added Jotaro Kujo
Update 2: Added Professor Kukui
Update: Added Papyrus
Here are 13 alts for the Kakashi over Captain Falcon moveset (http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=35493)

Note: If you are using this as a Brawlex clone, Captain Falcon's Blue Falcon transition will crash the game unless you use the included nullified final smash moveset due to a known Brawlex issue.
Note 2: This issue can be ignored on Dolphin emulator (known Dolphin issue) for a brawlex clone if you use and configure Sammi Husky's partially fixed Brawlex Captain Falcon .rel: https://mega.nz/#!PMxHiDYQ!jNfkPrXIqm14KVPK37ZNBZwdBBgho-e9GGILyvVxV5I

Title: Jetstream Sam
Description:
Update: BraveDragonWolf improved the right hand rig, added a new shine, and deleted duplicated objects.

Jetstream Sam from Metal Gear Rising: Revengeance was not easy to import! He has shiny metal and a face guard on his final smash state.

Title: Corrin (Male)
Description:
Update: Improved hand and hair rig.
Corrin (Female): http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=214921

At last! Corrin (Male) from Super Smash Bros. for Nintendo 3DS is here! He has a partial final smash transformation, shockingly low poly count, expressions, specular maps, and metal textures! He's awesome!

I'm aware that part of his hair clips through his final smash transformation but I don't know how to fix that without editing the moveset (untested moveset editing solution: http://forums.kc-mm.com/index.php?topic=61930.msg1166202#msg1166202).

Some recolor textures can also be found in the model download: http://www.models-resource.com/3ds/supersmashbrosfornintendo3ds/model/15704/

Title: Sora over Pit (More Alts)
Description:
Update 2: Added Phantom Hourglass
Update: Added King (Chess Piece)
This includes 5 models meant for this Sora moveset (http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=20043). These models work over regular Pit but they don't have Pit's shield or other weapons.

Authors: Ebola16, DSX8, MKHT, GentlemanPotato, BlueBrain, TheBen, Exorcist, Freikugel, Kyouma, TheRealHeroOfWinds
Credit: with credit to Boygos, CaliKingz01 and Nebulon

Update: Adjusted SFX
Here are 14 alternate costumes for the Majin Vegeta PSA (http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=206858)
This includes a PSA resize to accommodate the characters. If you plan on using a Vegeta model included in the original PSA download, set the model's "TopN" bone scale to (0.3937,0.3937,0.3937)

Title: Broly PSA (More Alts)
Authors: Ebola16, DSX8, GentlemanPotato, DemonBoy, bleachmagic, DevMasters, Tabuu Forte Akugun, ?uestion, AwesomeToad, RedMan911, GBC, Freikugel, Sir Kirby the 4th, Kyouma, MBHC
Description:
Update 4: Welded Omega Shenron
Update 3: Fixed Ogre's alpha function
Update 2: Added Mike Haggar
Update: Added an unknown character
Full Imgur album: http://imgur.com/gallery/Ns6fN
Here are 15 alternate costumes for the Broly PSA (http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=35385)

Title: Scorpion PSA (More Alts)
Authors: Ebola16, bleachmagic, DevMasters, Iwvi, AkaDarkZeroRmx, Sir Kirby the 4th, Serpifeu, nyancat6650
Description:
Update: Added Xaldin
Full Imgur album: http://imgur.com/gallery/W7LLl
Here are 10 alternate costumes for the Scorpion PSA (http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=204231)
I had some fun with my choices.

Title: Regular Samus Ship Entry
Action: Import, Other (Effects, Animations, Final Smash, etc.)
Description: This entry modification is designed for Brawl's original Samus moveset. LazyRed's original submission was designed to only work with Project M 3.6's Samus PSA (http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=210204). I also linked LazyRed's demonstration video which shows the P:M version of this entry (it looks the same in regular Brawl).

Title: Megaman X PSA (More Alts)
Authors: Ebola16, Nezha B. Rose, jaystring, Layell, Aghanim, Sylv
Description:
Update: Added Regice
The Megaman X PSA (http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=205694) already had some nice alts in it but here are a few more! The original models have been edited to be compatible with this PSA and recolors were also included if they were present in the original submissions.

Title: Madara (6 Path)
Description:
Here's Madara's 6 Path form from Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4! Comes with two forms, one with his 3rd eye covered and one with the eye uncovered. Credit to DSX8 for using his Magnus skeleton as a base (has bone edits)

Model Source: http://naruto-3d-modelers.deviantart.com/art/NSUNS4-Madara-6-Path-590486452

Title: Mad Archfiend
Description: Here's Mad Archfiend from Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's Wheelie Breakers! Comes with two versions, one for Captain Falcon and one for the Little Mac PSA (http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=209019).

Title: Hawkeye (UMvC3) with Dark Saber
Description: The original import over Link used Hawkeye's bow as a sword. This looked strange with the sword GFX so I gave him the Dark Saber from Transformers Devastation.

Title: Virtual Galaxy Halberd
Credit: with credit to ??_?, Ch33bDragonite and Katakiri
Description: I combined a few stages together to make a more colorful version of Halberd that can be walked across from front to back. The stage is huge! This adds a little variety from the standard Halberd texture. I made it a while ago but I should post it anyway.

Title: Nero
Description: jrush64 made the original import with the Nero moveset but he made a custom skeleton incompatible with Ike. This model works with most default boneset Ike PSAs.

Title: Ghirahim Final Form
Description: jrush64 made the original import with the Ghirahim moveset but he made a custom skeleton incompatible with Marth. This model works with most default boneset Marth PSAs. Comes with two versions: one sword and two swords versions

Title: PSA Friendly Juri Han
Credit: with credit to SJS and Nanobuds for the original model
Description:
Update: Added Juri PSA (http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=31982) version.
The original import worked over Sheik, however using it with PSAs was very difficult due to the large node and vertex counts. I reduced both of those. I also fixed some corrupt objects that caused graphical glitches and lag. Now this model works great with the Spiderman PSA too.

Title: Dark Magician
Description:
Here's Dark Magician from Yu-gi-oh! He was difficult to ProOptimize and rig. His vertex count is just barely under the maximum so he may cause some lagging.

Model Source: http://kitsuna020.deviantart.com/art/MMD-Dark-Magician-Boy-Girl-207992463

Title: Ahsoka Tano
Description:
Here's Ahsoka Tano from Star Wars! Comes with two versions, dual lightsabers and single lightsaber. I like using the dual lightsabers version of this model with the Yuri Lowell PSA: http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=205934

Model source: http://trdaz.deviantart.com/art/SW-Clone-Wars-Adventures-Ahsoka-Tano-S3-Outfit-323055601

Title: Misty
Description:
Here's Misty from the original Pokemon series! Her vertex count is close to the maximum so she may cause some lagging. 

Model source: http://darkliger01.deviantart.com/art/MMD-Project-Poke-05-Misty-2-1-DL-324590458

Title: James (Team Rocket)
Description:
The quality of this model isn't perfect but I did the best with it that I could.

Model Source: http://cherrybeam.deviantart.com/art/MMD-Team-Rocket-DL-570827235

Jessie had some UV issues so I may not get around to importing her unfortunately.

Title: Lunatone & Solrock
Description:
Two awesome Pokemon! For Orbitar Pit PSAs.
Blizzard Orbitar moveset: http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=205649

Flame Orbitar moveset: http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=202735

Title: Lust
Credit: with credit to AkaDarkZeroRmx and Gamidame_K
Description:
Here's a model that looks like Lust from Fullmetal Alchemist. This was one of my earlier imports that I gave up on initially but I finally finished it. It has a sizemod.

Model Source: http://2234083174.deviantart.com/art/MOTME-Lust-309941912

Title: Itachi (Naurto PSA)
Credit: with credit to ThriceWise and jrush64
Description: For the Naruto CoN PSA: http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=24251

Title: Chloe Price Recolors + cBliss Support
Description: Rigged by ebola16. Recolors by me. Comes with cBliss support.

Title: Chloe Price
Description: Here's Chloe from Life is Strange. Thanks to E-scope12 for the model and Final Smash eyes. The file size was massive so I had to make some sacrifices but they're not very noticeable.

Title: Textured Results Screen Franchise Icons with Improved Shader
Description:
Update: A slightly more complicated and accurate method can be found here: http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=220285

In order to reproduce the full texture effects of the Result Screen Franchise Icon, vertex editing is required for added icons. To avoid that, a texture can be used instead. By adjusting the shader, I was able to make these icons look better.

This download contains an edited model for displaying the icons more clearly on the results screen. It also includes instructions and a sample texture.

Title: Masked Lumen
Description:
Update: Fixed hip vertices on Marth version.
I never played the Bayonetta series but I really wanted to import this model into Brawl. Includes a verson for Marth and Sephiroth (longer weapon). He has spec maps for his mask and weapon.

Model Source: http://xkammyx.deviantart.com/art/Masked-Lumen-Default-Bayonetta-2-545119503

Title: Swordplay Arena v5
Description:
Comes with two versions, one with a whale that occasionally jumps out of the water and one without a whale.
The previous version of this stage had many errors within the sky model. If the camera was pointed below a certain angle, the stage would slow the game to a crawl.
I welded, edited the UV maps, and reskinned the model to solve the lag problem and make the sky look better.

Title: Kalos League Alpha
Description:
A larger, crazier version of Kalos League, in line with the ''Alpha'' design philosophy of Project M XP.

Goes over target test by default.

Includes various fixes by myself and ebola16.

Check out all my other (typically more balanced) stages (and give me feedback) here: http://smashboards.com/threads/349556/

Title: Non-Transforming Kalos League
Description:
Includes 5 different non-transforming versions of Kalos League:

> Main Hall
> Steel (Swords)
> Steel (Platforms; from Kalos League M)
> Fire
> Fire (No fire pillars)

All of them except for Steel (Swords) go over Skyworld by default.

Steel (Swords) goes over Target Test by default.

All variations include various fixes by myself and ebola16.

Check out all my other balanced stages (and give me feedback) here: http://smashboards.com/threads/349556/

Title: IMPROVED Black Widow
Description:
Update: Added a version with a fixed face but non-float values were used so metal materials won't work with the new version.
The original Black Widow import from Gamidame_K's The Avengers (Marvel Heroes) pack (http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=208439) crashed at the results screen due to a high node count. I reduced the node count via tristripper and altering weight precision. This edit also makes Black Widow PSA Friendly so the download link directs you to all of the PSA Friendly Gamidame_K Imports.

Title: IMPROVED Zeena
Description: The original import of Zeena required editing the Motion file to properly display her hair. I rigged her hair entirely to HeadN so an edited Motion file is no longer needed.

Title: Kalos League (Item Spawning Added + Non-P:M Fix)
Description:
The original version of this stage could not spawn items. I corrected this.
There was another glitch where parts of the stage would become invisible after hitting the center of the stage on non-Project M setups. The main platform was being treated as a broken target for target smash and became invisible. I resolved this issue too.
I added an original Brawl targets .rel for stgcustom usage in Non-Project M builds. This should make the stage compatible with both Project M and non-Project M setups.
soopercool101's platform and fire exit animation fixes were also included in this.
The actual base stage used is P:M target smash.

Title: Aizen Sosuke
Credit: with credit to ThriceWise and jrush64
Description: ThriceWise and jrush64 made the original import with their Aizen moveset but they made a custom skeleton incompatible with Marth. This model works with most default boneset Marth PSAs and I chose to use it with a Sephiroth PSA.

Title: Koishi Komeiji
Description:
Koishi was not easy to rig! Thank you Gamidame_K for assisting with optimization. Some model and rigging compromises needed to be made for space but they are not very noticeable. I'm happy with the end result!

Model Source: http://kasai-izzard.deviantart.com/art/MMD-Koishi-Komeiji-2-types-DL-SA-HM-ULiL-545593816

Title: Might Guy
Description:
This was one of my early attempts at importing. The rig isn't the best and the head bone is a little off but it's better to release things so people can enjoy them.

Model Source: http://xnalara-customized.deviantart.com/art/Naruto-Guy-Might-PACK-1-FOR-XPS-569879100

Title: Drake
Description:
For use with the Scorpion over Link PSA (http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=204231)
These low-poly models from Pokemon ORAS are easy to import so I did another one.
This is the link for all of my Scorpion PSA imports: http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=211997

Title: Flannery
Description:
A low-poly model and a base character that has slightly different proportions? Worth a try. One-slot resize was required.

Here's Flannery from Pokemon!

Title: Bass/Forte over Ness (More Alts + Minor PSA Edits)
Authors: Ebola16, Ike_Lawliet, Oizen, BlueBrain, SuperBarrio, carbuncle700, Kyouma, Pklvr94, bernie
Action: Texture, Vertex, Import, Moveset (PSA), Other (Effects, Animations, Final Smash, etc.)
Description:
Full Imgur album: http://imgur.com/gallery/B3Wxu
Update 3: Added an unknown character
Update 2: Added MetalEtemon
Update: Added Atlas, Raikage, Toriel, and Senator Armstrong.
12 new Bass models!
Comes with two PSAs. One has a PSA resize for Ganon-based models and removal of some inappropriate SFX when using Ness' original soundbank. The other only has the PSA resize.
Scale the original Bass models (http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=211173) by (0.61,0.61,0.61) for proper size with the edited PSA. If you do not wish to use my edited PSAs, scale all fighters in this file by (1.64,1.64,1.64) instead.

Title: Rey
Description:
First Kylo, now Rey from Star Wars!

Model Source: http://xnalara-customized.deviantart.com/art/Rey-584389881

Title: IMPROVED Scarecrow (Arkham Asylum)
Description: I improved the shader and corrected some stray vertices.

Title: vBrawl Balance Improvement (Haunter)
Description: Haunter originally had an explosion added to his AttackAirN attack. I replaced this attack with Metaknight's AttackAirN (no explosion) for better balance in a Brawlex build. This moveset does a pretty good job at recreating Haunter's moves and also utilizes Luigi's Negative Zone. Compatible with most default boneset Metaknight costumes. This download only contains the moveset and motion files. Thanks to secretchaos1 for the GFX porting.

Title: vBrawl Balance Improvement (Trapper Toon Link)
Description:
MAJOR UPDATE: Fixed a crash related to arrows.
Trapper Toon Link originally had an explosion added to his grounded SpecialHi attack. I restored vBrawl Toon Link's SpecialHi (no explosion) for better balance in a Brawlex build. The moveset is still strong but more beatable now. The focus of this moveset is trapping opponents in attacks that linger after their usage. Compatible with most default boneset Toon Link costumes. This download only contains the moveset and motion files.

Title: Keroro
Description:
Here's the main character from Sgt. Frog! His bat has been replaced with a plunger.

Model Source: https://bowlroll.net/file/7153

Title: Alpha Subunit of Hemoglobin
Description:
Do you like biochemistry or funky shapes? Then the Alpha Subunit of Hemoglobin is the Lucas mod you want! Hemoglobin is an important oxygen transport metalloprotein in your red blood cells. Its heme component is fearsome!

Imported from the Protein Data Bank (PDB ID 1GZX). 
More info on Hemoglobin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hemoglobin

Title: Castle of Dark Illusions
Description:
After importing the Taco Bell sauce packet, I had to go with the next logical import. Here is Castle of Dark Illusions with an updated security system! Comes with two versions, one for Orbitar Pits and the other for regular Pit (I recommend the Orbitar moveset version). I rigged everything to TransN so the castle wouldn't have weird movements.

Shown Blizzard Orbitar moveset: http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=205649

Flame Orbitar moveset: http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=202735

Title: Taco Bell Fire Sauce Packet
Description:
Fire Sauce? Flame Orbitar Pit? Seems like a good combo to me.
I got the idea from and modified this Taco Bell Hot Sauce Earring (http://tf3dm.com/3d-model/taco-bell-hot-sauce-earring-48204.html).
Comes with two versions, one for Orbitar Pits and the other for regular Pit (I recommend the Orbitar moveset version).

Shown Flame Orbitar moveset: http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=202735

Blizzard Orbitar moveset: http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=205649

Title: Tenor Saxophone
Description:
Brawl just didn't seem right without a saxophone. Comes with two versions, one for Pit and one for the Orbitar Pits (both Flame and Blizzard). I also added a little shine and the metal texture looks pretty cool. The model isn't perfect but it's the best one I could find.

Shown Flame Orbitar moveset: http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=202735

Blizzard Orbitar moveset: http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=205649

Title: Yagura
Description:
Works over Ike but I recommend the Tidus PSA for water effects. (http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=21976)
Model Source: http://naruto-3d-modelers.deviantart.com/#/art/Naruto-Yagura-PACK-1-500273963?hf=1

Title: Hoopa (Confined)
Description:
Update: Removed low-poly bottom ring and corrected arm vertices. Photos show updated version. 

Hoopa!

Title: IMPROVED Digimon Kaizer (Ken Ichijouji)
Description: The shader had incorrect settings which caused this character to display improperly on certain stages. This is no longer the case. I also fixed the stray vertex around the neck.

Title: Ryu over Wolf (More Alts + SFX Fix)
Authors: Ebola16, DSX8, RandomTBush, DemonBoy, DoctorFlux(Mariodk), Kagemaru, ApocHedgie, TheBen, HaxMax, Iwvi, AnImAiNe, RedMan911, Spex130, AkaDarkZeroRmx, Kyouma, UnbornLegacy
Credit: with credit to CaliKingz01 and DSX8's Ryu over Wolf PSA
Action: Texture, Vertex, Import, Moveset (PSA), Other (Effects, Animations, Final Smash, etc.)
Description:
Full Imgur Album: http://imgur.com/gallery/HpRj6/
Update 3: Fixed Assist Trophy reference issue
Update 2: Added John Cena and Yuugi Hoshiguma
Update: Added Zeus, Major Glory, Subspace Warrior, and Male Wireframe
I edited 13 models for CaliKingz01 and DSX8's Ryu over Wolf PSA (http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=210766). His other alts can be found in the original moveset download.
The included FitRyu.pac is intended for using Wolf's default soundbank and solves two endless loop SFX issues in Ryu's DownB and Final Smash attacks.
I also used the Wait 1 and 3 animations from this Ryu PSA since it looks better with these alts (http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=27779)
Note: Does not contain GFX edits

Title: PSA Friendly Zero Two Pit
Description:
This import worked over Pit, however using it with PSAs was very difficult due to the uncompressed file size. I optimized the model and textures. It now works with many more PSAs that don't require significant bone edits! (although not Project M)

It also had an issue with it's angry face so I deleted it. See the third photo for what happens when the angry face is shown. It's not in a lot of animations so it won't be too common.

Comes with two variations, one for Pit's bone structure and another for the Orbitar (both Flame and Blizzard) Pit's bone structure.

Shown Flame Orbitar moveset: http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=202735

Blizzard Orbitar moveset: http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=205649

Title: PSA Friendly Card Captor Sakura
Description:
This import worked over Zelda, however using it with PSAs was very difficult due to the uncompressed file size. I optimized the model. It now works with many more PSAs that don't require significant bone edits! (although not Project M)

Shown moveset: http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=31601

Title: PSA Friendly Gamidame_K Imports
Credit: with credit to BlackJax96 and Kitsu-chan
Description:
Update 6: Fixed Black Widow's face but no metal materials.
Update 5: Added Gengetsu.
Update 4: Added Itsuka Kotori (Effret) results screen fix.
Update 3: Added Rin and Sanae.
Update 2: Added Mononobe No Futo.
Update: Added Black Widow with results screen fix.
These 9 imports worked over the original characters they were designed for, however using them with PSAs was very difficult due to the uncompressed file size. I optimized the models in 3ds Max and/or Brawlbox. They now work with many more PSAs that don't require significant bone edits! (although not Project M)

Shown movesets: 
(Both Reimus) http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=33578&Moderated=All

(Kanako) http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=35385

Thanks to Kitsu-chan for the idea!

Title: IMPROVED Saffrule Pack
Description: The platforms in the center move. This stage had some weird placements with events occurring outside of the camera's range. I moved Lucario's Final Smash attack, Olimar's Final Smash landing, Pokemon Trainers and item spawn points to logical locations. I was unable to move the Ice Climber's Final Smash position however.

Title: Two More Madara Head Swaps
Action: Texture, Vertex, Import, Moveset (PSA), Other (Effects, Animations, Final Smash, etc.)
Description: Since Brawlex now allows each moveset to have up to 14 costumes, here are two more to complete the set! This download leads to my original Madara Head Swap post which contains all 14 costumes.

Title: Krusty the Clown
Description: His body doesn't match well with Brawl's skeletons but I gave him a try. Enjoy!

Title: Half-sized Tabuu with Minor GFX Fix
Authors: Ebola16, Anivernage, AGFanProduction, Tabuu Forte Akugun, diedhammer98
Description:
Update: Fixed a GFX issue where a pink ball would remain above Tabuu's head after using down special and CatchAttack.
I reduced Tabuu's size by half to allow his moves to better connect with opponents. I also removed his annoying Lose SFX.
This download only contains the fighter .pac. The other files can be found here: http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=31497
Thanks to Kitsu-chan for telling me how to resize a character in PSA!

Title: War Tobi
Description:
Well... I think I'm taking a break from characters with multilayerd. full-body robes -.-
Credit to DSX8 for using his Magnus skeleton as a base (has bone edits)
Model Source: http://naruto-3d-modelers.deviantart.com/art/Naruto-UNS3-Masked-Man-War-Tobi-UNLEASHED-411394241

Title: Ganon Final Smash Swap
Action: Texture, Vertex, Import, Other (Effects, Animations, Final Smash, etc.)
Description:
Full Imgur album: http://imgur.com/gallery/63wfW/
Update: Added Dunsparce.
Brawlex allows alternate costumes to load individual Final Smash files. This means each costume can have a different final smash! I made a pack that contains all of my imported Final Smash models for Ganondorf. 12 total!

Title: Kylo Ren
Description:
I had to do some serious model and texture editing to get Kylo into Brawl. Here he is! I also decided to try rim lighting again.
Kylo Ren (Alt Lightsaber): http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=214672
Model source: http://jkhub.org/files/file/2452-kylo-ren-tfa/
Lightsaber source: http://macmave.blogspot.de/2015/01/star-wars-episode-vii-free-crossguard.html

Title: Sylveon Knight
Description:
I found a pretty neat model, why not bring it into Brawl?
Model source: http://randomdraggon.deviantart.com/art/Sylveon-Knight-Download-428560476

Title: IMPROVED Mr. Face
Description: Original import by Ike_Lawliet. The original textures violated the power of 2 rule causing them to be garbled on real Wiis. I corrected the textuers, improved the shader, and added metal textures.

Title: Jack Daniel's Final Smash
Action: Texture, Vertex, Import, Other (Effects, Animations, Final Smash, etc.)
Description:
Go home Ganon, you're drunk.
This is the link for all of my Ganon Final Smash Swaps: http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=210565

Title: Ganon's Battleship over Skyworld
Description:
Rel-less port. Since the original stage was for Wi-fi room, I created custom item and player spawn points.
Posting this stage has emptied out my rel-less port stash. I won't be making more of these until I need to make room for another stage. Hopefully the Brawlex compatible ASL will be finished so rel-less porting becomes unnecessary!

Title: Heaven's Athletic Room over Skyworld
Description: Rel-less port. Since the original stage was for Wi-fi room, I created custom item and player spawn points. Some item spawn points were placed near angled platforms so items will bounce both vertically and horizontally. I also spaced them out to encourage exploring the entire stage. It's a lot of fun!

Title: Kabuto Yakushi
Description:
For the Scorpion PSA (http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=204231)
Another model experiment! Kabuto can handle the swords of Scorpion!
Model Source: http://xnalara-customized.deviantart.com/art/Naruto-Kabuto-PACK-1-FOR-XPS-553490226
This is the link for all of my Scorpion PSA imports: http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=211997

Title: IMPROVED Venus Lighthouse
Credit: with credit to LlamaJuice and Mewtwo2000
Description:
Update: I added a rel-less port for Temple.
I corrected the spawn points and Pokemon Trainer positions so Pokemon Trainer Pokemon spawn properly. This is the real Wii optimized version of the stage.

Title: Castle Oblivion over Stadium 2
Description:
Update: Added version with adjusted camera so the Battle Portraits are less likely to overlap the characters.
Rel-less port. Original stage by bleachmagic. I adjusted the camera boundaries to show off more of the castle.

Title: Orochi's Lair over Battlefield
Description: Rel-less port. Original stage by ForOhFor Error. This is an awesome looking stage and there's a pit in the center of it.

Title: Mr. 2 (Bon Clay)
Description:
You do you Mr. 2.
This model is missing his swans and he has some overlapping faces around his hands but I think he'll end up being useful for someone.
From One Piece.
Model Source: http://xnalara-customized.deviantart.com/art/Mr-2-524842864

Title: Zabuza Momochi
Description:
Works over Ike but I recommend the Tidus PSA for water effects. (http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=21976)
The shoulders aren't perfect but most animations look good with the Tidus PSA. It's about time we get Zabuza!
Model Source: http://naruto-3d-modelers.deviantart.com/art/Naruto-UNS3-Zabuza-Pack-FOR-XPS-437812363

Title: Gerudo Fortress over Distant Planet
Description: Rel-less port. Original stage by DSX8.

Title: Bowser's Keep over Battlefield
Credit: with credit to DSX8 and Peardian
Description: Rel-less port. Original stage by DSX8 and Peardian.

Title: IMPROVED Samurai Showdown
Description: I corrected the Pokemon Trainer positions and spawn locations.

Title: Mario Galaxy over Battlefield
Description: Rel-less port. Original import by DSX8.

Title: Crystal Ice Palace over Skyworld
Description: Rel-less port. I am a Tales of Symphonia fan and I've always liked the concept of this stage. Why not make it compatible with more stages?

Title: Tron over Skyworld
Description: Rel-less port. I also corrected the spawn locations for Pokemon Trainer Pokemon. This stage is a fun combination of horizontal and vertical platforms intended for longer fights. Characters will ricochet frequently with high damage.

Title: Professor Sycamore
Description: For the Naruto CoN PSA: http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=24251

Title: Kamiki Village (No Transitions)
Credit: with credit to DSX8 and InkEmissary
Description:
Update: Added Final Destination version 
Kamiki Village with proper spawn points for Pokemon. The stage does not transition. I also deleted the Torii that interfered with the camera when zoomed out. No rel porting is involved, but BOTH .pacs are required for this stage to work (Alternate File Loader compatible as an alt too).

Title: Swordsman Wally
Description:
Update: Added Riku PSA version (http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=28629).
Works over Ike but I use him with the Tidus PSA (http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=21976)
I felt like doing something a bit different so I gave Pokemon's Wally the Star Saber from Transformers Devastation.

Title: Clannad Field v3
Credit: with credit to Sanitys_Theif and FairKnight
Description:
Rel-less port (two of them!)
One is for Final Destination and the other is for Skyworld.
I optimized the textures for the upward moving spots to reduce lag.
I also corrected the Pokemon Trainer position and spawn points.

Title: Pokemon Trainer Ike Alts (Ash and Team Aqua Grunt)
Authors: Ebola16, mnsg, _Data_Drain_, Omni Shadow, Snoopy, Gamma Ridley, Nah
Description:
I made two alts for the Pokemon Trainer Ike with Old Rod and Magikarp model.
Original model by: Gravity, _Data_Drain_, Snoopy, Nah
Best Wishes Ash by: Omni Shadow
Team Aqua Grunt by: mnsg

Title: Tsukasa
Description: It's Tsukasa from the .hack series! Comes with two versions, one holding the staff in the middle and one holding the staff at the end for Sephiroth PSAs (although both will work with most Marth based PSAs). Tsukasa also displays his Guardian when the smash ball is obtained.

Title: Stone Tower Temple over Skyworld
Description: Rel-less port. Original stage by -BigSharkZ-. I like uniquely shaped stages.

Title: Lord Voldemort
Description: This guy presented me with a few challenges for rigging so I had to be creative.

Title: Bowser's Castle MKWii over Final Destination
Description: Rel-less port. I also corrected the spawn points so Pokemon Trainer Pokemon aren't stuck. Original stage by kwrk85.

Title: SM64 Vs Bowser (All in 1) over Targets
Description:
Rel-less port. I don't use Project M, but I wanted their Bowser's Castle stage in my setup so I made a different alt for it. This stage works for both Project M and non-Project M setups.
The stage is based on Target Smash (so is Project M's Bowser's Castle).
If you are using Project M, place the stage over STGKART_Z or STGKART.
Original stage by Mewtwo2000 and switches between the three images in the preview

Title: Tower of Guidance over Temple
Credit: with credit to Albafika and SJS
Description: Rel-less port. Original stage by Albafika and SJS.

Title: DEATH STAR
Action: Texture, Vertex, Import, Other (Effects, Animations, Final Smash, etc.)
Description:
'That's no moon...'
We definitely need a (Brawl sized) Death Star final smash for Ganon.
This is the link for all of my Ganon Final Smash Swaps: http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=210565

Title: Archie recolors
Credit: with credit to Ebola16 for the original model, TokoyamiTheDark for the Primal texture
Description: You remember Ebola16's epic Archie model, right? Well, TokoyamiTheDark and I took the freedom to make a few recolors, just for the sake of completion. Now, you have Team Colors, a black costume and even the Extreme Randomizer Archie color!

Title: Haku
Description:
Haku from Naruto! Comes with three versions; mask always, mask during final smash only, no mask.
Multiple layers of clothing are tricky to skin!
Model Source: http://naruto-3d-modelers.deviantart.com/art/Naruto-UNS3-Haku-Pack-FOR-XPS-437834093

Title: Burter
Credit: with credit to windhunter7 and skylanderszach
Description:
Comes with two versions, one for Ganon and one for the Broly PSA (http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=35385)
The shoulders could use a some touching up, but it's good enough for public release.
Thanks to windhunter7 and skylanderszach for helping troubleshoot the model.

Title: Sharpedo Final Smash
Action: Texture, Vertex, Import, Other (Effects, Animations, Final Smash, etc.)
Description:
A Sharpedo Final Smash to replace Beast Ganon for my Archie import (http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=209973).
This is the link for all of my Ganon Final Smash Swaps: http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=210565

Title: Fuu
Description:
Fuu from Naruto is here. Two versions, one always has wings and the other only displays them when the smash ball is obtained.
Model Source: http://naruto-3d-modelers.deviantart.com/art/Naruto-FUU-PACK-1-FOR-XPS-376706999

Title: Decus
Description: Decus from Tales of Symphonia: Dawn of the New World joins the fight over Ike! This guy was harder to rig than he looked.

Title: Konan
Description:
Works over regular Peach, but I recommend this Zexion PSA for papery effects (http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=205593).
Wow that cloak was hard to rig. I even had to cut part of the top off to better see her face. If you ever need to remove part of a model and a gap is created, you can use the "Cap Hole" modifier in 3ds Max to fill the gap!

Title: Archie
Action: Texture, Vertex, Import, Other (Effects, Animations, Final Smash, etc.)
Description:
Update: Added an optional Sharpedo Final Smash
First Maxie, now Archie! He was rather difficult to rig!

Title: Maxie
Description:
For the Naruto CoN PSA: http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=24251
I still can't figure out hand rigging so they are static for the moment. But he looks awesome!
Happy Halloween!

Title: Steven Stone
Description:
'Let me see… I'll give you this TM. It contains my favorite move, Steel Wing.'
I had to do a sizemod since his proportions didn't match well with Ganon.

Title: Death Star Gunner
Description:
*Star Wars Hype*
I figured out that rim lighting and metal materials are quite simple to do so I added them to this import and some of my older ones. (Rim lighting not shown in all preview pictures).

Title: Team Flare Admin (Male)
Action: Texture, Vertex, Import, Texture, Vertex, Import
Description:
Update 2: added Majin Vegeta PSA version (http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=206858)
Update: added metal materials
Gotta catch 'em all!
3ds Max and I are becoming friends but we still have a long way to go.

Title: Madara Head Swap
Action: Texture, Vertex, Import, Moveset (PSA), Other (Effects, Animations, Final Smash, etc.)
Description:
Imgur album: http://imgur.com/gallery/rLwqS
Update 4: Added Magnemite
Update 3: Fixed Mojo Jojo's file size crash and added Uchiha Symbol Icon
Update 2: added 2 more head swaps
Update: added metal materials
This is a demonstration of some experiments with 3ds Max. Model rigging is annoying, so doing some head swaps seemed like a good starting point. I also fixed broken reference issues that caused Madara to not use assist trophies (thanks KingJigglypuff for the reference idea).
Madara Moveset made by ThriceWise and jrush64.

Title: White Queen
Credit: with credit to Blackscar_swiss and LenSho
Description: Combined Feral Zelda's textures with the Shadow Queen model. It reminds me of the creepy white dancers from Lady Gaga's Bad Romance video. Includes CSP and BP.

Title: Yoshi's Island Final Boss (FIXED!!!)
Credit: with credit to Legendary Super Mario
Description:
Edit: Ebola16 provided a fix to the fighter entry issue, so please re-download if you downloaded this before.

This is a fixed version of Chuckdurnham, Stuff3 and Legendary Super Mario's "Final Bowser Battle" Stage. 

The original version had collision issues that allowed players to fall through certain areas of the stage. Ebola16 fixed those collision issues, but the stage had camera issues. This is the product of putting the collision data from Ebola16's version into Chuckdurnham's version. 

Now the stage has no known collision issues and no camera issues. 

This download comes with everything you need for the stage select screen (icon, preview and title), the brstm of the final boss theme from Yoshi's Island, and a .rel file to port the stage to Yoshi's Island (Brawl). 
This stage goes over Final Destination, if there are any issues, please let me know and I'll see what I can do.

Title: Final Bowser Battle over Flat Zone 2
Credit: with credit to Chuckdurnham and dolmonm
Description:
Rel-less port. The stage is largely 2D, so it seems appropriate to put it over Flat Zone 2. Original stage by Chuckdurnham and merged some things from dolmonm's Neutral Flat Zone 2. It has awesome animations.
(I tried repositioning CamLimit0N and CamLimit1N, but they won't change the camera. The stage is slightly off center.)

Title: SloSheik
Description:
Update: added metal materials
Who's that Pokemon? It's SloSheik!
ebola16 - 1, 3DS MAX - 1000
Not perfect, but I'm satisfied.

Title: Icicle Mountain over Summit
Description: Rel-less port. The camera moves in some unusual ways, which can make this stage even more hectic. Also, vegetables will spawn on this stage since it uses Summit's .rel. Original stage was made by DSX8. Enjoy!

Title: Psychedelic Trip Smashville
Credit: with credit to shadowsquid86 and Blazerrr
Description: Rel-less port. After some texture resizing and scene editing, this stage has been completed. I took the background from shadowsquid86's stage and placed it over Smashville. I used Blazerrr's recolored platform too. This stage looks pretty neat!

Title: KE$HA SMASH
Description: Tonight we’re going har har-har ha-ha-hard

Title: MISSINGNO. for 2D Marisa
Description:
Time to start the new year with MISSINGNO.! Watch as your favorite glitch whacks things with its Poké Flute! It also switches to some of its alternate forms while performing certain attacks. Some sprites are also purposely misplaced to make the character feel glitchy. Let's get 2D Marisa some more alts!
NOTE: Only works with this PSA: http://forums.kc-mm.com/Gallery/BrawlView.php?Number=34047

Title: Central Highway over Port Town
Description:
Update: The name of the stage is now correct. Thank you DMN666!
Another .rel-less port! I also fixed the Pokemon Trainer Spawn positions so they don't end up in weird places. The original stage was released in the Brinstar section of the vault. Happy holidays!

Title: IMPROVED Tabuu's Cruise
Description: Fixed player spawn points. No more frozen Pokemon Trainer Pokemon at the start of a match! The launcher in the center of the stage still works. Original stage made by Guamboy27.

Title: IMPROVED Apocalypse stages pack
Description:
Updated character spawn points, collisions, and crystal textures
Stages shown from left to right:
STGMETALGEAR00.PAC (Requiem)
STGMETALGEAR01.PAC (Eternal Nightmare)
STGMETALGEAR02.PAC (0 ZONE)
Weather effects are random!
Original stages by Dark-Wind

Title: Bikini Bottom over Delfino Plaza
Description: Updated, now works with real Wiis too. This was a nightmare to make, but the stage does not require a .rel. Player and PokeTrainer Spawn Points were adjusted. Original stage by Vish and is over Final Destination.

Title: IMPROVED Temple Time Gate (Legend of Zelda Skyward Sword)
Description:
Update: Added version with adjusted camera so the Battle Portraits are less likely to overlap the characters.
It's amazing how a few small tweaks can really improve a stage. Great job DSX8, this is one of my favorite stages!

Title: Termina Field over Bridge of Eldin
Description:
UPDATE: Added rel-less port for Temple too
Rel-less port. Shout-out to Mewtwo2000 for help with the Pokemon Trainer positioning. This is an old stage, but I like its shape. I wanted it over Bridge of Eldin without needing a .rel. Note: I could not find the original author of this stage.

Title: Akatsuki Hideout over Final Destination
Description: Hello all, I thought this would be a good time to release my first submission to the vault. I really liked the third stage of DSX8's Naruto Siege #1 over Castle Siege, but I thought it should be a standalone stage. Hence, I made it Final Destination compatible. Enjoy!

Title: Vaati (Legend of Zelda Minish Cap)
Description:
Update:
Ebola16 fixed the texture issues Vaati had and made it Project M compatible. Enjoy

Infinite Smash Team:
http://infinitesmashteam.com/2012/12/23/merry-triforce-day/
_________________________________________

Vaati Joins the Brawl!!!

one of my christmas gifts to you all for the holidays and what better way to do it than to unleash evil upon the land!

Includes:

- Vaati with transform on FS (FitLucas00)
- Vaati with just plain FS eyes (FitLucas01)
- Blinking eyes and stuff
- shiny stuff
- Staff over lucas's stick
- one slot resize
- Perfect Metal

-NOTE- this model was custom made by me and dot..any importing and rigging over another char without our permission is considered stealing and plagiarism...we will only allow recolors and psa's for this hack
